name: Hytale
author: info@blstmo.com
description: Hytale is a sandbox game by Hypixel Studios that combines building, fighting, and adventure in an epic fantasy world. This egg supports dedicated Hytale servers following the official Hytale Server Manual.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt-get update
apt-get install -y curl unzip

cd /mnt/server

echo "Downloading hytale-downloader..."
curl -sSL -o hytale-downloader.zip https://downloader.hytale.com/hytale-downloader.zip

if [ ! -f "hytale-downloader.zip" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: Failed to download hytale-downloader.zip"
    exit 1
fi

unzip -o hytale-downloader.zip
rm -f hytale-downloader.zip
chmod +x ./hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux-amd64

echo "Downloading Hytale Server..."
./hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux-amd64

echo "Installation complete."
